item.title: About us
item.author: contact@fnjoin.com (Salman Malik, Archie Cowan)
item.description: We have deployed applications to the cloud hundreds of thousands of times for small and large organizations alike. The systems we have created are on a trajectory to reach 1 million deployments to the cloud. We want to help you create systems that will also achieve 1 million deployments to the cloud. Setting your organization on a path to reach 1 million cloud deployments is achievable through automation, engineering practices, and organizational culture.
